title: This link is old. Is there a way to update it?
body:
It was saved back when the coding was different and it will not work anymore. The link was to a thread here. Can anyone help?

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/c/support/lfiwY5o3-can-we-get-an-eta-on-when-cb-will-be-live-and-the-old-forums-deleted

replies.body:
I actually found the thread myself!

It got changed to this it seems during some Boards update.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/lfiwY5o3-can-we-get-an-eta-on-when-cb-will-be-live-and-the-old-forums-deleted

Great to hear that you were able to find it again!  It does appear that there were issues with the old Help and Support community on the Boards vs the new one that was released.  

Feel free to create another discussion if you have any other issues!  ^.^

Hello Colonel J,

Was this thread on the old Help and Support Community?  Or was this a thread created in one of the other communities/boards?  It may point to a different root cause as to why this thread no longer exists!

I am unsure, but this link worked a couple weeks ago.

I made it during Community Beta and it got converted onto Boards.
